entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as standing beaming at Harry and Ron from the bank. He is trying to pull Harry upright.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is described as standing beaming at Harry and Ron from the bank, alongside Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being exhausted and trying to tell Fleur that Gabrielle is fine. He is also being pulled upright by Dumbledore and Bagman.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being dragged back to the bank by Percy.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as looking white and much younger than usual, and dragging Ron back to the bank.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is trying to restrain Fleur Delacour from returning to the water.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is described as being hysterical and fighting tooth and nail to return to the water. She is also hugging her sister Gabrielle.

entities.name: gabrielle
entities.description: Gabrielle is mentioned as Fleur's sister, whom she is hugging and trying to comfort.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is described as seizing Harry and pulling him over to Hermione and the others.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is trying to pull Harry upright, indicating that he is helping him.
Ludo Bagman is also trying to pull Harry upright, indicating that he is helping him.
Percy is dragging Ron back to the bank, indicating a forceful relationship between them.
Madame Maxime is trying to restrain Fleur Delacour from returning to the water, indicating a controlling relationship between them.
Madam Pomfrey is pulling Harry over to Hermione and the others, indicating that she is caring for him.
